attributes.review: As soon as I got the app I was bombarded with questions and pop up ads. I felt like I was being harassed by constant notifications. Asking for personal information constantly! Very annoying!
attributes.title: Harassment

attributes.review: It’s not user friendly and it honestly doesn’t have any content worth looking at. Let’s talk about Medical rights for Trans people. Equal rights for black people, indigenous people, poc, LGBTQ+ lets condemn all the racists and the fascists. Trump is a dictator and America is a violent police state because of his widespread hate speech. #dumptrump #fakenews
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: Tried to play the included scrabble game and believe me I had good words. Great words. The best words. But is wouldn’t let me use anything. I tried hamberders. I tried hustory. I even tried covfefe, but did it take them, NO! Probably some deep state programmer blocking good republican words.
attributes.title: SAD!
